column1: #Text=[0158] glacial acetic acid added at an approximate concentration of 0.5% of the total volume, and
#Text=[0159] dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) added at an approximate concentration of 1% of the total volume.
#Text=One liter of this solution suffices to fix 60 specimens of tissue held in tissue cassettes.

#Text=C. in a commercial tissue microwave processor (H2500 or H2800, Energy Beam Sciences) for 15 min in a 1500 ml beaker containing the first solution; agitation of the solution is obtained by bubbling to accelerate solution exchange.

#Text=[0161] The specimens are incubated in a solution of 55% isopropyl alcohol, 25% acetone, 10% polyethylene glycol (average molecular weight 300), 10% low viscosity mineral oil, glacial acetic acid added at an approximate concentration of 0.5% of the total volume, and DMSO added at an approximate concentration of 1%.
#Text=C. in a commercial tissue microwave processor (H2800, Energy Beam Sciences) for 15 min in a 1500 ml beaker containing the solution, which is agitated by bubbling.
